'''Tea-Smoked Squab''' is a [[food]] item that the player can cook. The recipe for Tea-Smoked Squab can be purchased from [[Lianfang]] for {{Item|Mora|x=2,500}}.

Depending on the quality, Tea-Smoked Squab restores '''20'''/'''22'''/'''24'''% of Max HP and an additional '''900'''/'''1,200'''/'''1,500''' HP to the target character. Like most foods, this cannot target other players' characters in [[Co-Op Mode]].
